titles.title: O For a Faith that Will Not Shrink (William H. Bathurst)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for a faith that will not shrink, Tho’ pressed by ev’ry foe, That will not tremble on the brink Of any earthly woe!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That will not murmur nor complain, Beneath the chastening rod But in the hour of grief or pain, Will lean upon its God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord give us such a faith as this, And then whate’er may come, We’ll taste e’en here the hallowed bliss, Of an eternal home.{/lang-eng}
